item.title: ::shop command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Can’t you open the interfaces? by something like…

public void openShops(int shopID) { interface method(shopID); //replace interface method with your server's interface showing method. } and then openShops(2); in your command to open shopID 2.

Not much experience with 508s sorry.

item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

b15:

first off, what does this have to do about my post. second what is the name of your server and is it 317 or 508?

Why 317 or 508? It can be 474, 562, and 614 too. Also, on your post, find the method for opening a shop in your files, and put it in your command. Another thing, my reputation keeps getting higher for some apparent reason.

item.title: ::shop command
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:2, topic:381719”]} else if(cmd[0].equals("shops") && p.jailed != 1) { p.teleportTo(xxxx, yyyy, h, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1678, 0, 1679, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Teleport to shops");

xxxx

This is the x coords

yyyy

Then the y coords

h

h is the height, 0 = Ground
1 = one floor up
2 = two floors up[/quote]
Na, he’s talking about opening a shop by typing in a command like:if(cmd[0].equals("shop1")){ openShop1(); }
I don’t know anything about a 508, so yeah.

Read full topic
